text: ma kane liehli-lmedineti vemen havlehum mine-l'a`rabi ey yetehallefu `ar rasuli-llahi vela yergabu bienfusihim `an nefsih. zalike biennehum la yusibuhum zameuv vela nesabuv vela mahmesatun fi sebili-llahi vela yetaune mevtiey yegizu-lkuffara vela yenalune min `aduvvin neylen illa kutibe lehum bihi `amelun salih. inne-llahe la yudi`u ecra-lmuhsinin
